mapper.insert:
INSERT INTO PRODUCT_STORE_PDM ( ID, PROD_NO, PROD_NAME, NORMS, PARAM, MODEL_DESC, MATTERS_TYPE_ID, UNIT, ALLOW_NO, PATENT_NO, SELL_NO, VERSION_NO, LEVEL, MATERIAL, QUALTY_TIME, PROD_STATUS, ROCK_POSITION, STORE_SET_ID, CUR_AMOUNT, FACTORY_SET_ID, WARES_SET_ID, REMARK, DELETED, COMPANY_ID, CREATE_TIME, CREATE_BY, MODIFY_TIME, MODIFY_BY ) VALUES ( #{id,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{prodNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{prodName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{norms,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{param,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{modelDesc,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{mattersTypeId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{unit,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{allowNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{patentNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{sellNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{versionNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{level,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{material,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{qualtyTime,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{prodStatus,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{rockPosition,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{storeSetId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{curAmount,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{factorySetId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{waresSetId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{remark,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{deleted,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{companyId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{createBy,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{modifyTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{modifyBy,jdbcType=VARCHAR} )
SELECT LAST_INSERT_ID() AS ID
SELECT SEQ_PRODUCT_STORE_PDM.nextval as id FROM dual
mapper.update:
UPDATE PRODUCT_STORE_PDM
PROD_NO = #{prodNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
PROD_NAME = #{prodName,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
NORMS = #{norms,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
PARAM = #{param,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
MODEL_DESC = #{modelDesc,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
MATTERS_TYPE_ID = #{mattersTypeId,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
UNIT = #{unit,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
ALLOW_NO = #{allowNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
PATENT_NO = #{patentNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
SELL_NO = #{sellNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
VERSION_NO = #{versionNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
LEVEL = #{level,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
MATERIAL = #{material,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
QUALTY_TIME = #{qualtyTime,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
PROD_STATUS = #{prodStatus,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
ROCK_POSITION = #{rockPosition,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
STORE_SET_ID = #{storeSetId,jdbcType=BIGINT},
CUR_AMOUNT = #{curAmount,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
FACTORY_SET_ID = #{factorySetId,jdbcType=BIGINT},
WARES_SET_ID = #{waresSetId,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
REMARK = #{remark,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
DELETED = #{deleted,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
COMPANY_ID = #{companyId,jdbcType=BIGINT},
CREATE_TIME = #{createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
CREATE_BY = #{createBy,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
MODIFY_TIME = #{modifyTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
MODIFY_BY = #{modifyBy,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
WHERE ID = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}
